Constructor Detail

CityOps

Method Detail

voronoiDiagram

public static Geometry voronoiDiagram(Coordinate[] coords,
                                      boolean clip)
Builds a Voronoi diagram describing the city structure.

Parameters:
coords - An array of Coordinate containing the position of each land lot.
if - true, the resulting diagram will be clipped to the city shape.

getCityHull

public static Polygon getCityHull(Graph lots)
Gives the general shape of the city. The result is based on the convex envelope of every land lot seeds which is then buffered a bit so that border cells are not pressed againt the city border.

Parameters:
lots - The graph containing every lots of the city.
Returns:
A Polygon to the shape of the city.

insertLot

public static void insertLot(double x,
                             double y,
                             Graph lots)
Dynamically inserts a new lot to the city. This method is typically called when adding a new lot during the simulation.

Parameters:
x - The x-axis position of the new lot.
y - The y-axis position of the new lot.
lots - The graph containg every lots of the city.
